item.title: [PI] RevealedX vBulletin||VPS||SPAWN||Need Developers [PI]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:23, topic:407083”][quote author=profection link=topic=508378.msg3692569#msg3692569 date=1312224426]
Applying for: Website Developer
Something about yourself: I am 17 years old, Love playing sports, hanging out with friends, making money, coding websites, hanging out with the girlfriend!
Name: Tyler
In-game Name: -none-
Age: 17
What code do you work with(PhP, vBulletin, etc): php, html, mysql, smf, vBulletin, javascript, pretty much everything.
Past Websites/Work (proof): Worked on naxster.com
Experience(Years/Months/Days): 2-2.5 years?
Why should you be chosen for this position (50 words minimum)?: The reason you should pick me is because I am very experienced and I can get the job done and make your website look professional. With the things I add to your website it will be attractive to other members!!
Email or IM name(optional): pm me if I get accepted. Don’t want to give on here.
[/quote]

We currently have a web developer. If you want to apply for a different position, then that’s fine.

Name: Trevor
Age: 15
Experience: roughly a year.
Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Yes I will follow the rules, I will use my powers respectively like this: I give 3 warning then I mute, etc.
Will you do your work and not slack of/not do your job?: Yes I will do my work, I’ve never slacked off so far.
Why do you think you’d help RevealedX Forums?: Mainly the reason is because I have been a moderator before.
Why should you be chosen for this position (100 words minimum?): I think I’d be chosen for this position because, I do not abuse my powers, I do not allow people to make me rage on them and I feel that I can make a good impact on the server.
Email or IM name(optional): I’ve got a skype, “judostar11”, if you want my msn ask me in pm.

I’m guessing you are applying for in-game moderator? If so, accepted. I will pm you for your MSN and I will give you links to the server.[/quote]

Yes i’m applying for ingame moderator

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] RevealedX vBulletin||VPS||SPAWN||Need Developers [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

It’s not a 100% spawning server. There are items that cannot be spawned. Such as dungeoneering armor, Pvp armor, chaotics, etc. We have an RXP system which they can donate for. With Super donator status, the players will have the ability to use overloads, and they gain more RXP per event. Extreme donators get to use special restores, and they get more RXP per kill well. Extreme donators will have more commands, and be more respected. We are currently working on all the donator benefeits.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] RevealedX vBulletin||VPS||SPAWN||Need Developers [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[quote=“Pull Ups, post:9, topic:407083”]Applying for: Web Developer/Forum Moderator
Something about yourself: I am a 17 year old who loves forums and helping others. If there is anything you need me to do, chances are that if I can, I will.
Name: Nathan
In-game Name: Nathan
Age: 17
Experience(Years/Months/Days): 2 to 3 years.
Email or IM name(optional): natewentworth@hotmail.com[/quote]

Accepted as a forum moderator, I will add you on MSN ASAP.

[quote=“Daniel™, post:12, topic:407083”]Applying for: Client Coder
Something about yourself: I’m an outgoing 16yr young man, who loves to code in his spare time. I am a cheerful, helpful, sweet, and loving person who cares about the things I do. I do not have a car, so I have been stuck at home for a long time, except for when my friends pick me up
Name: Daniel
In-game name: Daniel
Age: 16
Past work: I have many, but the servers were never released to the public because we couldn’t afford a VPS.
Experience(Year/Months/Days): I’d say: 2years 5months (I don’t know about how many days.)
Why should you be chosen for this position (50 words minimum)?: I’m home a lot babysitting so I could be on for around 7 hours a day. (depending on what time I wake up.) I feel like this server will succeed further with the clients I can make.
Email or IM name(optional): Daniel.Dodson95@Live.Com[/quote]

Accepted as well. I will add you on MSN ASAP.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] RevealedX vBulletin||VPS||SPAWN||Need Developers [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

First off I fully re-did the combat system, re-did the shit dungeoneering system, added 3 new bosses, added drops for all npcs, added a new drop system using a manager the old one was shit, added 3 new ranks including hidden admin;super donator;and extreme donator, added extreme potions as well as super restores, added soul split which was shit, added new dh system with a manager, and I added full player commands. Also let’s not say I leeches the pictures if you have no idea? Because I took these pictures 5 minutes before poetic this thread. Thanks for teh flame fag. Gtfo my post?

Read full topic
